website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate option for large-scale and long-term outdoor projects, as this durable, reliable, and weather-resistant time-lapse camera is built to record your projects from start to finish and beyond.
pros: 80-day battery life of time-lapse shooting in 30-minute intervals
Includes ball-head mount that rotates 360° and heavy-duty mounting clamp
cons: A rechargeable battery would have been preferred over using 4 AA batteries

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like a little extra work
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start where everyone else starts - the manual. It’s been over simplified. An explaination as to what their specific meaning of certain terms are would be at least adequate. The buttons also should be a bit more complex. Having two buttons serve four purposes is not easy. And they are counter intuitive. Bottom line - donttask an engineer to design the user interface of anything. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: KhouriTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not Weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to track construction progress of one of our projects. Unfortunately both cameras purchased did not live up to being weatherproof. Both cameras allowed moisture to infiltrate the battery holding area which caused the batteries to corrode and ultimately rendered both cameras inoperable. Brinno did not stand behind the cameras, only offering to repair for a fee. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Mercury34

customer_reviews.title: Not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: About 3 months into our 2 year timelapse, I began to notice moisture inside the clear sealed case. Dried it out, checked the seal, everything looked fine. 2 weeks after remounting it the time lapse footage stopped due to so much moisture inside the case. When I opened the case water dripped out. The battery compartment has battery acid every where now. It won't last outside. We lost a large amount of footage on this once in a lifetime construction project. I don't recommend using this on something outside that is important. Now looking for another solution, and quick! Every day we lose something special.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: SD card needs a computer why??
customer_reviews.text: I planned on using this a lot and was looking forward to having a self contained time lapse. But case is weather resistant but not weather proof. Why have a case with rubber seals then? I can’t trust it to the weather at 10,000ft it wouldn’t last long. Then it yelled me I need a computer with Windows on it. What why I have tons of card readers but I will never have a windows computer again. So I sent it back due to there very old software!!! If I can’t read my memory cards as I choose I will never buy your product again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Munky

customer_reviews.title: Corroded Battery Compartment
customer_reviews.text: This camera was shooting for 3 months (January - March) before I discovered the batteries exploded and corroded the camera from the inside out. The camera was fixed to a pole with the provided clamp and weather-proof casing. There goes $300...
customer_reviews.author: Steel Construction Co.

customer_reviews.title: Okay buy
customer_reviews.text: We just received it and I set it up for the weekend to take pictures. In terms of the picture quality, I expected it to be more clear and HD like given the price point. Also not impressed about the focus as it is manual and it takes some testing to figure out the best focus because adjusting it while looking through the small screen isn't easy. However, this is the only good construction time lapse camera that I've seen in the market so far
customer_reviews.author: Tumal K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Turns on and off during the hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Turns on and off during the hours set. The video quality is good. It’s. It 4K like my gopro, but the batteries last FOREVER in this thing. Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: JeepWranglerMoabGuy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Needed to have a time lapse camera for work so bought this to try out. Well, the product came and it has a dent on the screen and does not even turn on (tried different batteries too). Very disappointed in the quality and we now have to delay the project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works then doesn’t. Try again?
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I bought this at the beginning of the year for a project and after the first month the SD card didn’t want to stay in. Now it stopped recording for no apparent reason whatsoever. So I’ve lost two weeks of video. I realize tech doesn’t always work out. Brinno, please make this right and send me a new one. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: B. Chatwin

customer_reviews.title: Construction Use
customer_reviews.text: I’m in construction, and have bought a few Brinno products in the past, and have been very happy. I bought the BCC200 to take time lapse images of our work for marketing reasons. I bought this specifically for its durability and picture quality; I haven’t been disappointed. I’m actually buying another one to use as a security camera on the job site.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very good. Image quality good be better
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. Image quality good be better. Batteries last only about 30 days in the heat, but the unit itself has lasted through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: azmkat

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars +
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it does connect to mobile via Bluetooth or any sort of apps
customer_reviews.author: Zouheir

customer_reviews.title: Bad directions
customer_reviews.text: I find the directions to be not clear at all and the set up very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little camera. Every construction site should have one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traffic studies
customer_reviews.text: I needed to show the traffic pattern over a whole day, I sent this up by the road and ran if for the day and it was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gaeto

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 pack, only 1 came in mail
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, and I like the secureness of the clamp. Only 1 of the 2 pack came in the mail and I had to make no less than 6 phone calls and a volley of emails to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Daniel

customer_reviews.title: USED PRODUCTS BEING SOLD AS NEW
customer_reviews.text: Ive ordered this camera twice now (returned the first one)) and both times Ive received it in brand new packaging but upon opening its clearly a used unit as indicated by the excessive scratching of the LCD.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product to film construction project. Protective case leaked causing device to fail and corrode batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Miamishopr

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera but the housing leaks
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera but the housing leaks. O-ring is perfectly intact but drops of humidity for in the bottom of the housing after 2 weeks in hot climate
customer_reviews.author: ESA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor were OK quality. Did not work well in our construction application.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very useful for keeping track of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very useful for keeping track of my home projects. I would recommend this product to my friends. It could be used easily to track for tracking the progress of projects or nature lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Crachi

customer_reviews.title: Very good time lapse video and convert the files to time ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good time lapse video and convert the files to time lapse videos automatically. Love the alloy clamp which works with any surface. Great bundle and great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cam, you need to have right setup in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cam , you need to have right setup in order to have longer recording time which i did not achieve till now!!
customer_reviews.author: Saeed O Bahadi Bajaba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have bought, endless possibilities!!
customer_reviews.author: david h lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but could be a little easier to adjust lens. Maybe without a set screw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sealed, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Will update review after use. So far so good. Package came sealed and unopened as if I bought off shelf at Best Buy. Quick guides included. Extra batteries included. Mounting bracket looks really solid. Purchased for a 6 month commercial development. Will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Bigtexasmike

customer_reviews.title: The BCC200 camera does a great job and they have great customer service as well
customer_reviews.text: The BCC200 camera does a great job and they have great customer service as well. What more could you ask for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Brinno BCC200 is an excellent resource for both tracking progress and security
customer_reviews.text: The Brinno BCC200 is an excellent resource for both tracking progress and security. As a residential developer, progress and security are two of my main concerns and the BCC200 is perfect for these purposes. It is easy to use and functional. The picture is also crystal clear. I can track progress over the life of a project, while also using the pictures as references for future use. Construction sites are also big targets for thieves, so having a dependable camera is vital. The product is also extremely durable, which is key on any construction site. I highly reccomend purchasing the Brinno BCC200.
customer_reviews.author: Aacquaviva51

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are very clear and the mounting brackets that are included allowed very easy attachment to the framework of the window
customer_reviews.text: We have only used one of the two cameras. The pictures are very clear and the mounting brackets that are included allowed very easy attachment to the framework of the window. The camera is very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: For this price I expected much better.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not user friendly! For this price I expected much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cassaday

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use, the clamp and case make for getting its up and running quickly very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Attached is what we received in the mail which is only one unit.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Wagenbach

product_meta.title: Brinno BCC200 Time Lapse Camera w/Mount & Accessories Best For Construction & Outdoor Security 80 Days Battery Life, 720p HD, Weather Resistant Case Batteries Included
product_meta.description: View 2 months of construction in just 2 minutes with the Brinno Time Lapse Construction Camera Pro! This bundle includes a model Brinno TLC200 Pro HDR time lapse video camera, a model ATH120 dustproof weather resistant housing, an industrial-grade aeronautical aluminum alloy clamp and 2 bungee cords to secure the camera to a vertical surface. The Brinno TLC200 PRO is the world's first HDR time lapse video camera. With an interchangeable CS mount lens and a 1.3 megapixel High Dynamic Range (HDR) image sensor, the TLC200 PRO produces stunning 720p time lapse video under virtually any lighting conditions, from low light to intense backlighting. The aspherical 19 mm f/2.0 glass lens produces a 2X increase in sharpness and a 4X increase in low light performance. The camera produces ready-to-view video at the push of a button with no need to spend hours on post-processing. To use, simply set your time interval on the 1.44 inch LCD preview screen, aim, and wait for the video to finish. The interval between frames is selectable between 0.3 seconds and 24 hours. The preview screen allows for precise framing of scenes. Playback the AVI video file on a Windows computer from the camera’s SD card, or use a micro USB cable to retrieve the video file from the camera. Resolution: 1280 x 720 (16:9). Includes a 8GB SD card (32GB maximum) and 4 AA batteries that provide an amazing 80 days of operation using a time interval of 30 minutes.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR: Battery life up to 80 days using only 4AA batteries, ideal for capturing extended time lapse video. Record over 2 months of progress with 1 charge. Complete coverage of your construction site or activities & projects while quarantined at home.

TIME LAPSE VIDEO:Superior quality and reliability for your small or large projects while working from home. Stunning 720p HDR video. The 1.3MP sensor and interchangeable CS mount offer many options, stop-motion, still photography, don’t miss anything.

EASY TO USE:: Time-lapse function is automatic and ready to use while home from school. Time-lapse video, not a series of pictures. Editing your video is a snap! Video is ready in an easy to read video file format that works with any editing software.

SAFE FOR OUTDOOR USE: Includes our ATH120 with an IPX4 weather resistant rating, its housing unit allows you to use your BCC200 anytime of the year! Waterproof casing and rugged construction allow this to be the perfect camera for any outdoor project.

INCLUDES: Our weather resistant housing case ensures your gear is protected. An industrial-grade clamp, for easy mounting anywhere. Rubber strap for easy carrying, 4GB SD card, 4 AA batteries, and user manual so you can start using your gear right away.
